title: TRTFINANCE
author: TRTFINANCE
content: TRT.Finance is a revolutionary Farm-as-a-Service project that operates on the Binance Chain.The project is designed to allow users to passively earn rewards from yield farming across various networks.TRT.Finance makes it easy for everyone to earn farming rewards without farming on their own.Instead, TRT.Finance aims to maximize prots and make them accessible to its members simplyby holding $TRTThe funds to farm across dierent networks will be taken from a Treasury wallet, as mandatedby TRT governance, and the rewards will be returned automatically to the dividends pool forparticipants (investors) to claim as BNB or $TRT.TRT.Finance is also committed to contributing towards building a community-run metaverse.As a crucial part of the project, TRT.Finance suggests allocating treasury funds towards Pay-to-Earngame development, immersive 3D and metaverse experiences, and NFT-based games, and investingdirectly into teams and corporations with a long-term vision in TRT games and P2Edevelopment. This will be achieved through community voting as per majority decisions madeby TRT.Finance members.WEB: https://trt.finance/TELEGRAM: https://t.me/trtfinanceTWITTER: https://twitter.com/trtfinanceWHITEPAPER: https://trt.finance/pdf/white.pdf
